debug.description: Node.js and CLI only. Prints debug messages.

encoding.description: Output image encoding. One of: `base64, dataURL, raw, buffer`. By default: `raw`.

format.description: Output format. One of: `png, jpeg`. By default: `png`.

help.description: CLI only. Print usage information, then exit.

anyOf.description:
Raw data is stored in instances of the Buffer class.
A Buffer is similar to an array of integers but corresponds to a raw memory allocation outside the V8 heap.  A Buffer cannot be resized.
Valid string encodings: 'ascii'|'utf8'|'utf16le'|'ucs2'(alias of 'utf16le')|'base64'|'binary'(deprecated)|'hex'

input.description:
SVG code to render as plain text.

For CLi or Node.js, it can also be path or glob file pattern to .svg files, relative to current dir.

left.description: Cropping left offset. Introduced in v1.2.14

output.description:
Node.js and CLI only. Folder for output files. If it doesn't exists it will be created. If none, output will be written to
stdout.

quality.description: Quality level (0..1). Only used for jpeg

top.description: Cropping top offset. Introduced in v1.2.14
